Introduction
This implementation guide has been developped by Arkhn to modelize the french PMSI (Programme de Médicalisation des Systèmes d'Information).
Technical Overview
This implementation guide develops FHIR profiles, that add restrictions to the original FHIR resources to be interoperable on the way to modelize the PMSI on FHIR. The French PMSI has been developped to collect and analyze medical data, and to facilitate the budgetary allocation of french hospitals.
This implementation guide can be downloaded here as a npm package or as a copy of the entire specification.
